Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: M. Santina
Reviews.Content: My first impression of this camera was its cheap!  Coming from a metal cased Casio the Samsung is very light weight and feels of cheap plastic.  Nothing like the solid build feel of a galaxy phone or similar Samsung "plastic" product. Getting past the initial impression the phone started to grow on me.  It has a lot of good features; split screen shots, front display, wifi so you can back up directly to a computer, send via e-mail or share on facebook.  Transferring pics is very slow and you can only do 6 at a time(e-mailing)but its nice to have if you're not in a time crunch.  I have not printed out any photos yet but viewing them on the computer they look very clear.  When taking shots I did notice that the "Smart" setting didn't always pick the best setting and some of the pictures came out dark.  I ended up making a custom setting that worked best.  The only other complaint was that the menu could be more user friendly.  You have to go throught all the settings and options.  There should be a one click solution to go to picture settings or 1 click for wifi etc.  Different folders not just 1 big one.  All in all I wasn't looking to buy a high end camera and for $129 with 8GB card, tripod, case and more included in this bundle this was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: very nice for the $$
Reviews.Author: M. Kirk
Reviews.Content: Nice camera bundle for the money.  The camera itself takes good pics and has lots of cool features.  Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Kristipher Tolman
Reviews.Content: Love the wifi connectivity. Takes great pictures and videos in many different conditions. Lightweight and compact. The product was great, had some trouble with beach camera sending stuff. Didn't have everything in the box and he camera was defective. They sent a new camera which worked fine, but had to send a third box with the missing items. Kind of unorganized feeling, but ended up with everything (after a month and several phone calls).

Reviews.Title: Good camera but didn't get what was promised!
Reviews.Author: CHERYL MAVEETY
Reviews.Content: Love the camera but the memory card that was included didn't fit so we had to go buy a new one.

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Penny Anderson
Reviews.Content: It showed an extra battery came with the camera but their was a tri pod instead. So I was not happy with that if it hadn't been a Christmas gift for my granddaughter I would have sent it back. And the sd card did not fit the camera.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Tammy Hayes
Reviews.Content: Had this sent to my sister in law to her home address for Christmas gift.  It arrived on time and I know that she is going to love it.  Love being able to have shipped directly to her.  Made gift sending easy.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use.
Reviews.Author: ROSAVS
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son's girlfriend. She loves it. She told me it was very easy to use and was able to upload pictures to her FaceBook page with no problem. I Have seen these pictures myself and they look great.

Reviews.Title: Where is 16GB card ?
Reviews.Author: HEE-EUN KIM
Reviews.Content: You indicated online that 16GB card was included but i've received 8GB card.I don't understand. What happened ?Except that situation i really like itSo how can i change my card ?

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung DV150F Dual-View 16.2 MP Smart Camera with Built-in Wi-Fi - White 16GB Bundle
